title: Reflections on a pamphlet stiled, A just and modest vindication of the proceedings of the two last Parliaments, or, A defence of His Majesties late declaration by the author of The address to the freemen and free-holders of the nation.
author: Bohun, Edmund, 1645-1699.
publisher: Printed by M. Clark for George Wells ...,
notes: Attributed to E. Bohun. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
